landingPage.resumeText: Fullstack developer focused on building modern and scalable solutions, with strategic vision and experience in workflow automation.

develop.title: Stack
develop.contentText: Environments I use the most to develop my projects.

design.title: No-Code
design.contentText: Visual tools and automations I usually work with.

framework.contentText: Backend services and APIs I integrate into my projects.

tools.title: DevOps

aboutMePage.title: ABOUT ME
aboutMePage.paragraph_one: I am a versatile fullstack developer with over 6 years of experience building digital products and a solid background in startup ecosystems.
aboutMePage.paragraph_two: Throughout my career, I have been involved in all stages of development: from idea conception and early validation, to implementation, deployment, and continuous improvement. I have worked in both technical and leadership roles, combining strategic vision with hands-on execution.
aboutMePage.paragraph_three: My focus is on identifying opportunities for improvement and process automation, optimizing time and resources, and ensuring that each project advances quickly and reliably in ever-changing environments.

id_1.title: OpenVote App
id_1.description: Application for managing political party membership that offers a visual way to view and create events on a shared map, with level-based restrictions.

id_2.title: OpenCities Web
id_2.description: Official OpenCities website which, in addition to static content, includes a web app similar to the mobile app but with extra sections for collaborators, such as a dashboard and a CRM.

id_3.title: OpenCities App
id_3.description: The app works as an incident reporting center, alerting nearby users as well as collaborators responsible for handling those reports.

id_4.title: GoBox App
id_4.description: A delivery-style app for construction materials, with tools to help visualize and manage variables related to the construction sector.

id_5.title: GoBox CRM
id_5.description: Web application built with Angular (frontend) using PrimeNG and Supabase (backend). It includes a wide range of modules such as proforma management, clients, products, suppliers, activity calendar, and more.

id_6.title: Mr. Delivery
id_6.description: Mr. Delivery is a mobile platform for ordering food online. It allows users to browse local restaurant menus, select items, and track their orders in real time.

id_7.title: Tingo
id_7.description: Tingo Comercio is an app designed to simplify order and inventory management for businesses. It allows management of pending, in-progress, and delivered orders, as well as enabling and editing products. It also includes advanced features like order history and weekly/monthly revenue statistics.

id_8.title: Fast Food Store
id_8.description: A Progressive Web App (PWA) accessible from any device. The page functions as the client-side of a delivery application, allowing users to add items to a cart, remove or add more, and see the total cost before proceeding to payment.

timeline.title1: Digital Marketing Platforms & Social Media Business
timeline.title2: Traffic Analysis for Detecting Cyber Attacks with Wireshark
